item.title: JetBlue and American Airlines Propose Partnership
item.description: JetBlue Airways Corp. and American Airlines Group Inc. have proposed a partnership that would allow them to coordinate schedules and share gates at airports in Boston, New York, and other cities. The partnership has been met with opposition from some airlines and consumer groups, who argue that it would reduce competition and lead to higher fares.
